div.p: THIS SMART RANCH DESIGN FEELS OPEN AND AIRY WITH ITS VAULTED GREAT ROOM, DINING ROOM AND FOYER. THE SECLUSION OF THE MASTER SUITE FROM THE REST OF THE HOME ADDS TO THE FEELING OF SPACE IN THIS HOME. IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR MORE SPACE, WE CAN FINISH THE WALKOUT LOWER LEVEL TO DOUBLE THE SQUARE FOOTAGE. STILL TIME TO CUSTOMIZE THIS UNIQUE HOME TO YOUR PREFERRED FINISHES.

ON THE FOUNDATION OF A WALKOUT LOWER LEVEL, THIS CREATIVE DESIGN FEATURES A DUAL STAIRCASE, BUTLERS PANTRY OFF DINING, OPEN AIRY GOURMET KITCHEN WITH GRANITE COUNTERS, HARDWOOD FLOORS, AN ADJOINING GREAT ROOM WITH FIREPLACE AND 9FT CEILING. A STUNNING PRIVATE LIBRARY ROUNDS OUT THE FIRST FLOOR. SECOND FLOOR LAUNDRY. A MASTER SUITE DESIGNED AS A RETREAT. 3 ADDITIONALL BEDROOMS COMPLETE THIS BEAUTIFUL HOME.

THE CREATIVE DESIGN OF THIS ELEGANT RANCH HOME WILL BE SURE TO ENHANCE EVEN THE MOST SELECTIVE HOME BUYERS LIFESTYLE. 12 FT CEILINGS, 2 SIDED FIREPLACE NESTLED BETWEEN THE GREAT ROOM AND SPACIOUS GOURMET KITCHEN. A BUTLERS PANTRY OFF DINING ROOM. THE RETREAT STYLE MASTER SUITE FEATURES HIS AND HER WALK IN CLOSETS, TRAY CEILING AND BEAUTIFUL BATH WITH LARGE SOAKING TUB AND SEPARATE SHOWER.
